A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too much analysis.You can pick holes in it if you want but you can find holes in every Star Wars film... every film...
This is an excellent movie. It's a brilliant Star Wars. 
It is the best since Empire. Mark Hammill absolutely bosses it as an aged embittered Jedi. It's gripping. You think you can guess the ending but there are about 5 times you think the film ends and then there more story - which is great. 
I'm staggered by the low user ratings. Geeky cynics maybe? Watch it\, you will love it.
